project_abstract.cdata: The project objectives are to increase production, productivity and marketability of agriculture, livestock and aquatic products in the Northeast and Heilonggang areas.  The project will: (a) rehabilitate irrigation structures to optimize use of surface and well water; (b) set up a water monitoring and evaluation system and develop a water resources plan for the province; (c) provide needed input, improve seed production facilities, strengthen agricultural research and extension; (d) increase efficiency in sheep and cattle production through ammonification of wheat and corn straws and alfalfa planting; (e) produce fertilizers (urea and monoammonium phosphate) and promote use of cotton stalk in particle board and fluting paper manufacturing; (f) strengthen agromachinery service stations; (g) improve efficiency of aquaculture investments by rehabilitation and construction of shrimp ponds, modernization of processing facilities and construction of fishponds and scallops chains; and (h) provide equipment and technical assistance, particularly in agroindustries and overseas training programs.

P003558.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>河北农业开发项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是增加河北东北地区和黑龙岗地区的农牧渔业产品生产，提高生产率和产品适销性。项目将：（1）进行灌溉设施改造，优化利用地表水和井水灌溉；（2）为河北省建立水资源监测评价系统，制定水资源管理计划；（3）提供所需投入，完善种子生产设施，加强农业研究和农技推广服务；（4）通过制作小麦和棉花秸秆氨化饲料和种植紫花苜蓿，提高牛羊生产效率；（5）生产（尿素和磷酸一氨等）化肥，推广使用棉花秸秆生产刨花板和瓦楞纸；（6）增强农机服务站能力；（7）通过改造和新建虾塘、对加工设施进行现代化改造以及新建鱼塘和扇贝生产加工链，提高水产养殖投资效率；（8）提供设备和技术援助以及国际考察培训，尤其向农业企业提供设备和技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
